============================
Morphology: brivla heuristics
============================

lo cmalu klama
---
(source_file
  (statement (sumti (lo) (sumti_tail (selbri (tanru_unit (brivla))))) (selbri (tanru_unit (brivla)))))

lo ce'u klama
---
(source_file
  (statement (sumti (lo) (sumti_tail (selbri (tanru_unit (word))))) (selbri (tanru_unit (brivla)))))
